data.title: Early Round A Main Nebula + Gravity Well Combo to Contest Space
data.description: Use this early round Nebula + Gravity Well combo to contest space in A Main.

data.title: Delay Nebula + Gravity Well for C Bend
data.description: Use this delay Nebula + Gravity Well combo to make it more difficult for enemy players to push through Bend into C Site, or plant the Spike.

data.description: Here's a simple, but effective, B Site chokepoint delay setup.

data.description: Here's a simple, but effective, C Site chokepoint delay setup.
